content.detailedDescription: I was off to the west i notice them.  i really was quite unusual.  they appear almost to be a diamond pattern with the center being the brightest.  they did seem to be almost flashing and different colors.  i did notice a place closer to me blinking across the sky. what i saw was not a plane.  don't really know what it was, but it was odd.
content.summary: Almost appeared to be a diamond i guess.

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and a friend were watching monday night football during a  a dark commercial break we went outside for a smoke and we were 
looking up at the sky like we always do when a boome rang shaped object  flew into my line of sight. it did not make a sound and it did not deviate from its flight path from south to north. i don't know what i was seeing because it was dark and very dimly lit almost transparent so you couldn't see any detail of the object. you could see how as it was crossing the sky how it was bending the light to barely make it visible to the eye. as this was happening i turned to my friend to ask him if he could see it too but i could see from his reaction he was seeing it to and we watched it until it flew out of our line of sight. after rewards i felt that i needed to validate what i saw with what i had witnessed to compare the two so i didn't tell him what i saw to see if he would discribe the same thing and sure enough his discription of the object was exactly what i saw. at that point i couldn't believe what i just witnessed i know what i saw was real.
content.summary: As i was looking up at the night sky , i observered what apeared to be a boomerang shaped shadow flying from south to north

content.detailedDescription: I was watching monday night football and went outside to smoke a cigar. i was looking at the sky talking to a friend when this large boomerang shaped ship flew into my view. it was moving south to north. i watched it until it disappeared. like 4 seconds. it made no sound. it had several round lights on the wing. i had no idea what the object was it happened so fast. i'd like to think its man made but i've never seen anything so big moving so fast making no noise. i feel very lucky to have witnessed this. i'm amazed. i had to tell someone asap. i found doug's number and called. i'm beside myself knowing that boomerang ship does for sure exist and it not some discovery channel bs.
content.summary: Very fast moving boomerang ship flew over with no sound!

content.detailedDescription:
Let me start off by saying i'm an intelligent, logical person and after seeing this for the third time in 5 years, i'm left with zero explanation which really bothers me.

background
i have seen this occur 3 times. i will describe the last experience. the last time i saw these lights was this weekend, 9/29/2013 at 12:45am in missouri. 

description
after coming home from a movie with my gf after midnight, i closed the door to the car and for some reason glanced up into the sky. almost directly overhead i noticed a cluster of lights move very fast across the sky. they were in a loose triangle formation, but almost hard to see because the lights were faint.
my best description would be imagining 8-12 satellites moving across the sky about 5x normal speed. whatever this object is could cover the distance of the entire sky in about 6 or 7 seconds. what bewilders me is that this appears to be in space, or at least an altitude of 60k feet or higher. (imagine seeing the pleides only twice the size, then zipping across the sky in 3 or 4 seconds on a flat trajectory. that is exactly what it looks like)

my initial reaction was probably a jaw drop and then i pointed and said, "look!". it was almost gone by then but my gf got scared and wanted to go inside. i did notice that when it fades away that it doesn't get closer to the horizon. it just stays on a flat trajectory and then fades from view. my initial thought was it was a cluster of stealth bombers (yes, that was my initial thought) because that was the only thing that could have been low enough to move across the sky that fast and not have flashing lights or be heard. but, after research and asking friends, it seems stealth bombers are very loud and there was perfectly silent. after going over the experience in my head many times, it seems the lights were much too high for it to have been that. and although it's hard to explain, there was just something too eerie and 'inhuman' about it. too fast, too quiet, no blinking lights, no hard shape.

my gf is also very intelligent, rational person and was really frightened after seeing it. after going inside, i wanted to confirm what we both saw, so i asked her to logically explain what it was and she had no answer. "was is a satellite?" -no. "was it a jet?" -no. "was it a meteorite?" -no.

summary
the other 2 experiences were nearly identical. each time has been between 10pm-1am in the summer. same light formation, same silence but extreme speed across the sky. very unworldly. i hope to see it again if only with some more friends.
content.summary: Cluster of lights move fast across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Dateline west los angeles 7:30pm pst 9-30-13. i let my dogs out in the front yard to do their thing and i look up in the nw sky towards and i see solidly lit red and green object in the sky at about 8-10 miles distance making impossible stop and go lateral and vertical movements in complete silence and for no reason in the sky, in the middle of an international traffic route coming in from the western pacific over the u.S.. this went on for about 1 minute before i went inside and got denise to witness it. it then went on performing maneuvers for another 2 minutes after that. this thing was showing off in the sky, in the middle of a traffic route instantly rising and falling below that route. i never seen anything like it ever. i'm looking skyward at night because the skies are full of planes around here but it's all controlled airspace.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I look up in the nw sky towards and i see solidly lit red and green object in the sky at about 8-10 miles distance making impossible stop and go lateral and vertical movements

content.detailedDescription:
Standing on my deck looking at stars on an extremely clear night tonight: the lights were completely still in a single position to the ne of my home. the rate of blinking was extremely rapid and unchanged through a distinct specific array of individual colors. 

there appeared a smaller set of identically colored lights perhaps 5 degrees left of the larger original set , which also exhibited rapidly cycling lights, like the first lights that i sighted.

during a 15-20 minute observation i asked my wife to also look at these objects, both of us using our 2 sets of binoculars. she confirmed and also said she saw the curved disc shape of the larger object showing the intense rapid lights extending rays of color as they blinked extremely rapidly, which lights appeared radiating from an apparent point on the bottom of the object. a radius of some edge appeared illuminated, then discontinued as the night sky behind the "object" profiled an apparent darker edge.

the larger object was many many times more brilliant than the surrounding clear stars. and an aircrft with lights crossed directly through my binocular line of sight during obsevation. the subject brilliant object was much much brighter than the aircraft lights , perhaps a turboprop sounding) which carried its own conventional aircraft light array.

the original lights in rapid firing sequence appeared to my wife to become a ball of honeycomb array of all clors, and she further described it as "disco ball" of rainbow colors.
content.summary: Rapidly blinking rainbow at regular rate of multi-color brilliant disnct lights totally stationary in sky position

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at a stop light in edmond, ok.  i had the sunroof cover open.  something caught my eye.  earlier i had been commenting on how clear the sky was.  i kept looking up today wondering about the cme reported and looking for chem planes.  i could not believe it.  i was so stunned at first, somewhat mesmerized.  my teenage daughter was with me as i had just picked her up from class.  i started yelling, "what is that omg, what is that??? look, look!!" she said she didn't see any thing.  i turned her head slightly as it was above us but also right in front of us.  she was like, "i don't know, i think it's a balloon"  then it shot up and west. she said, "that is not a balloon!"  the light had changed and people were honking.  it was a very busy intersection and i couldn't believe people weren't looking up.  we were heading west and i kept trying to keep track of it.  it shot around; zig-zagged when it was right in front of us again it went from clear to silver to clear and sometimes iridescent;  with tails or tentacles hanging from it...They were light green, purple and pink..Maybe yellow.  i was trying to find a place to pullover when it shot up.  i pulled into what we call "the bus barn"; where public school buses are parked.  it came back toward us and just hovered. it eventually just disappeared.  it was there and then it was gone!   i got a still shot of it which only looks like a bright object.  you can barely make out the tentacles, but you can see them if you enlarge it. i also have a very short video. i was just aiming the camera at this point because i could not see it through the lens of my phone.   i waited several hours before i sent it to my computer.  when i watched the video i could not believe it! there was a second object; long cigar shaped that flew by at such a rapid speed i did not even see it with my naked eye.  it may have been some light reflection from somewhere but i had my phone/camera out the window; window was down.  i sent a message to local weather station.  they asked for the pic but have not responded.  i have to know, was this just a weather balloon?  was the second object some light reflection?  most importantly, i cannot stop thinking about it.  it did not look like a space "craft".  it looked like an actual being itself.  also, i am extremely irritable tonight and just want to be left alone.  almost like the very presence of someone else is extremely annoying.  i feel like i've had some kind of experience and believe me...I have never believed in et's.  i saw something else recently too on sept. 6th.  i have only been looking to the skies in anticipation of ison.  oh! and shortly after it was gone and we were driving home, there were very low flying planes; not just small engine planes but a jet as well.  the jet was headed south and was still west of us.  weather balloon?  please tell me!  if you watch the video, watch full screen.  i didn't see the second object until i had it on full screen which also makes me think it was a digital anomaly.  thank you!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sometimes clear;sometimes silver/light; with colored tentacles.  jellyfish!

content.detailedDescription: Observer was driving down dorr st. around 4:30 in the morning when they observed what looked liked a hovering triangle near the corner of dorr st. and richards rd. at first, they thought it was the top of a cell-tower in a place not before seen. then drove up to it and was virtually beneath it. the car windows were put down and the observer did not hear any sound what so ever. when reaching for cellphone to take a picture, it began to move (silently) away from the witness. the entire event transpired in about 2 minutes.
content.summary: Triangular object. soft edges. one light on each corner. solid. no blinking. silent.

content.detailedDescription: While at my daughters soccer practice i just happened to look up into the sky and noticed the two objects moving in the same direction but as they advanced further into the horizon they seem to move further from each other. i have included video taken with my samsung giii as video evidence. the focus isn't all that great but you can see two objects in the video. the sky was clear with light cloud cover on the horizon to the sw. both objects did reflect sun light for a couple of seconds before they vanished into the horizon.
content.summary: Two objects side by side but at a distance from each other.

content.detailedDescription: Went for a walk along my road and over the power lines i saw the only "star" visible because of a cloudy night. watched for a few minutes and at first i saw a bluefish green lights, then went inside to show my mother and then it was still stationary but with red lights. watched for a few minutes more and my mother went inside and i proceeded to call my father who lives next door to us and it just kept ringing. i have no idea if it has any connection, but i'm going to go check it out again...Be right back...Ok that's creepy, me and my mother went back outside and it was still there but skittle lower and we saw clearly a plane headed toward it and then it dissapeared under the treeline....
content.summary: Stationary star-like object with blinking red/green/white light

content.detailedDescription: Was cleaning windows one clear afternoon(1pm) in upstairs bedroom(2nd story)then from behind rooftops flies this metallic orb, it wasn't too shiny,more like polished lead in appearance.And not very big either,about size of large gym ball from my perspective.It moved relatively slow at about 40 - 60 mph toward the nw.I kept my eyes on it for about 1 min until it went out of site.No lights. no noise.Straight line. strange.
content.summary: Small metallic orb about 30m off ground flying north-west at about 40 - 60 mph.

content.detailedDescription: Three of us were on the beach watching the moon rise in melbourne beach, florida on sept. 19th 2013.  looking over the ocean one light orb appears and hovers before joined by another similar orb just directly above and to the south.  these two light orbs looked as big as a penny, maybe a little larger from where we were on the beach.  they somewhat pulsated, like fire, but were perfect circles and hovered, not changing shape or size.  after hovering for about 10 minutes, the orbs seemed to sink towards the ocean ever so slowly, and then move back up to their original spot.  after a few minutes, they seemed to disperse as if perhaps traveling east away from the beach, over the ocean more until they disappeared.  a week later, talked to a neighbor who described the same thing from the beach just a mile south of where we were. in the picture attached, the moon is the obvious light on the right hand side. the two smaller lights are the orbs we witnessed.
content.summary: One orange/yellow fire type orb appears and then another, hovered for 10 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: The plane and the unidentified object were heading in a westerly direction. the object then  abruptly stopped and took off to the east at a very high rate of speed. it vanished from sight.
content.summary: I saw an object following a plane very closely.

content.detailedDescription:
my husband and i were exiting our local foodtown by foot around 8:15 p.M.Sunday, sept,29,2013.
upon exiting the parking lot onto wikoff place, i looked up at the trees across the street and saw a large orange, glowing orb. i immediately said to my husband, "what's that?!" (although i was pretty sure i already knew)it was larger than a star or a planet and the color was not what you usually see. the night was crystal clear and there was a lot of plane activity - small and commercial planes, so we had lots of things to compare it with. i even looked straight up and was able to see a satellite moving over us in a nw to se direction. it was very clear.
  as we walked towards maple ave. (rt. 35), getting away from the trees, we noticed there was a second one to the left of the first one i had spotted. both were traveling slowly towards the west/sw in an identical flight pattern. if i had been holding a yardstick arm's length away in front of me, that's how far apart they appeared from our perspective. they were randomly pulsating orangey yellow light. they were moving at the same speed which was slower than the airplanes around us.
  the one to the left started moving either upward or just started getting smaller and it's light got smaller in diameter and eventually went out alltogether. from our perspective, it was hard to tell if it was rising or just fading out. the second one followed the same scenario.
  we started walking north on maple ave. and less than 30 seconds later, a third one appeared out of the ne and followed the exact same path as noted above. there was no noise and the edges appeared fuzzy, no solid surface was detectable, just a bright orange glow.
  when the third one disappeared as the others had, we scanned the skies but did not see any more. i noticed on your map that reports say 5 to 8 of these were seen in the ny/nj area so maybe we caught the tail end of the sightings.
  i thought is was very cool and i was excited. my husband went right to the computer when we got home, which was only three blocks away from where we saw them, and googled "orange orbs in the sky". several youtube videos came up of very similar sightings to what we saw. i will be watching tonight to see if they return.
content.summary: 3 orange orbs traveling from ne towards sw that eventually faded out

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking. listening to music on mp3 player . saw what looked like a star getting bigger  then it turned on its side and flew in a way plane s and helicopter can not .  when above me  mp3 player stopped working( no sound)  went over the out line of the moon and  got and out line and  then proceeded to get smaller from the outside rapidly giving the impression that it went straight up in speeds unknown .  helicopters where in area  minutes latter  about 3 min approx
content.summary: 6 lights 3 large white 3 small red  hexagon shape

content.detailedDescription: Driving along delaware river going to my cousins house and i just happened to look towards the river and seen 2 golden square shape objects (floating,hoavering) side by side. i brought it to my cousins attention and he pulled over. then got out of the car and stared in augh for about 10 mins. then we got back in the car and drove off and i couldn't keep my eyes off the objects. as we drove farther i lost vision of the objects.We got to my cousins house and tried to figure out what we saw and we summed it up to it had to of been ufo's.
content.summary: 2 golden square shape hovering over (it seemed) delamare river

content.detailedDescription: I was saying good-bye to my husband as he left for work (7:30am), walked up my stairs into the apartment when i noticed it. looked like it started in the middle of the sky, it looked beautiful so i took a picture of it. i didn't stick around to see how long it was in the sky for.
content.summary: Saw it randomly start shootin' up into the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Same as above.  sighting lasted maybe two seconds.  i am an amateur astronomer.  it sounded like a military jet but way, way to fast for the altitude.
content.summary: Heard an object that sounded like a military fighter.  looked up to locate object.  object was moving extremely fast.  beyond the speed of anything i know of.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in  my back garden and i just looked upwards, i thought they were 2 stars at first but realised they were moving.  these 2 object were on the same level and heading towards each other.  they then crossed paths, there were no tails behind them, just 2 star looking objects.
my 1st thoughts they were going to collide, but they did not and just passed each other...One of them then faded and the other came to a standstill and stayed motionless after that and just looked like a star in the sky.
content.summary: 2 star like objects crossed pathed then one faded away

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my pasture and looked up to see a small long skinny cylinder flying high above, half again as high as private planes fly. pretty soon another went by, then a clear small sphere with a white band around the middle came past. all were at same speed and height. there were a few more that went by for a total of 6 or so. i was alarmed at first. they appeared to be moving as fast as a jet. they moved strait across the sky both directions nw to se and se to nw cruising along at an even speed, silent and with no change of direction. i thought they were drones but then i thought ufos. this went o
n for an hour.
content.summary: 6 ufos over a pasture in mi

content.detailedDescription:
Getting in my car around 8:30 pm, i noticed two bright lights of approximately the same size hovering low below a mostly cloudy sky.  this was in town, and the clouds were low enough to be highly illuminated by the city lights.  the two objects moved independent of each other - one slightly faster than the other first west to east, then southeast.  one of the objects (the one that seemed slightly larger or closer) moved slowly at a consistent altitude, the other object (slightly smaller) ascended and descended and moved about in a wandering fashion - also smooth and slow in flight, but meandering around the other object, circling it entirely at one point.  both object grew more faint in brightness as they appeared to travel toward the se and winked out, one then the other as they entered the low cloud bank.  i tried to video them with my camera phone, but upon review the light must have been too poor because the entire video was just black.

my first impression of these objects was that they were not supposed to be there - they didn't resemble anything i've seen in the night sky before, and they were not far off.  they were the brightest thing visible in the sky and they were below the clouds.  the feeling i got was that i was viewing something that i was not supposed to be seeing. i've been thinking about it almost constantly since then.  after the objects faded into the clouds, i stood there for several minutes to see if they would appear again but they didn't.  i gave up and went to a convenience store to get something to drink, and i felt a strong urge to tell someone or ask around to see if anyone else had seen it, but i didn't.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two glowing objects traveling se in a wandering fashion, disappeared in very low hanging clouds at  night.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 3:30 a.M. observed what was initially thought to be a helicopter to the south about two hands with's above the horizon until i noticed that one of the flashing lights was blue. it was the brightest non-moon object in the sky. the sky was clear with no clouds at any altitude. observed with binoculars but was unable to tell shape of object. i asked my fiance what colors she was observing and confirmed red, yellow, green, white and blue. object remained stationary for 45 minutes cycling colors randomly. the lights at times seemed directional at times sphere-like at times rectangular/cigar-shaped or a cross as its aspect changed. it was too distant to see a superstructure with any clarity even with 8 power binoculars. observed two aircraft (red/white navigation lights at much less intensity than the object).  one traveled south at a relatively high rate of speed towards the object and then banked right and traveled quickly out of view to the west. another traveled north along the horizon at relatively high rate of speed to the east of the object about ten minutes later. total time of observing the aircraft was approximately one minute per observation. given time of night and nature of flight patterns i speculate that they were air national guard from burlington, vt. i attempted to take a video but the camera-phone was less than ideal, it is shaky and i upset a sleeping bird.

stopped viewing for about ten-15 minutes at the 45 minute mark approximately. returned to the window and saw that the original light had moved west and was partially obscured by a tree limb.  the observed several lights, originally thought to be stars but noticed they flickered.  binoculars showed the same light emission patterns.  there were 5 additional lights arranged roughly north to south with varying intensity due to distance with two advanced farther to the west forming a roughly l shape, though i believe there was a salient in the formation as the dimmest and closest to the horizon object was not the tip of the l..  the lights maintained this formation and drifted slowly west until they were obscured by a tree. total time observed was approximately 1 hour with a break.

i have observed aircraft in this area for thirty years and have seen all manner of usaf and commercial aircraft at night as there was a air force base here formerly.  i have observed helicopters and i believe a drone in the area as well at night.  these lights were unlike anything i have seen in the night sky. i can't explain what i saw, i do not believe in extra terrestrials and i can see no rational reason for any craft to use lights in this fashion. nevertheless, we saw what we saw even if it defies explanation.
content.summary: Multiple flashing lights stationary then slow sw transit

content.detailedDescription: Last nite at pretoria north,gone to get some dinner when a friend pointed out alight in the sky,we looked up and saw this stunning glow like light in the sky we thought it was a prank then many people gatherd and staired at this beauty,it was round wirh a sort of halo around and above never seen enything like that amazing,many friends around the world said they saw somthing similler last night 29/09/13 what is going on? maybe its becouse of nibiru aproching ? it was there for +- 30min then just vanished
content.summary: Big round with shiny halo above

content.detailedDescription:
About 7:20pm i was about to point out a commercial jet (low, just overhead & going north) to my 3-year-old, when i saw a very bright, silverish tube-shaped thing higher up and to the southeast, heading southwest. i thought it might be a plane fuselage reflecting the sun (which had just set), but it was brighter than any plane i'd seen.

i watched it closely and saw no wings or blinking nav lights. there was no sound (though a faint sound probably couldn't be distinguished from nearby traffic noise).

i thought it was strange looking compared to the aircraft i've seen, and watched it closely. afterward we went inside and i checked wolfram alpha for planes overhead, it listed two commercial jets and three cessna-type planes near the horizon, but this didn't look like any of those.

it didn't get closer to the horizon as it receded (as a plane keeping a consistent altitude will do). it just kept going in a straight line until it faded from view, at about a 70-degree angle in the southwest.
content.summary: Bright tube-like object flying in straight line

content.detailedDescription: Was spiral in shape,did a lot of spinningchanged colors
content.summary: Spikey,round lots of colors

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
It almost looked like (what i imagine) 2 sets of 4 jets flying in formation. but the tail lights/engines? were just lights (star sized) that seemed to only appear as the sun was reflecting off of them. sorry- i type like hulk (and have stuff on the stove i forgot about). zoiks...

my wife came out and witnessed... "hm. yep that's different. is dinner ready yet"

i tried running across street (picture was useless, but taken) as a few teens were playing bball. i interuppted the game and they thought i was crazy. one kid tried seeing them whiel others mocked me (although i could still see them flickering on and off). ooops now i really gotta go. give me email addreszs and i will fw the "useless" photo if you want
content.summary: Saw 8-16 star/venus? sized lights maybe attached to two groups of 4 objects?

content.detailedDescription: First of all i would like to say i am not usually a blogger or post to internet about things but this seemed to weird not to report and share to see if anyone else saw the same thing i did... approx 12:15am sept. 28th 2013 i was laying in my bed looking out my bedroom window that faces sw i always look out this window at night to help me fall asleep so i know the skyline and what stars are where. but that night i had this star that was so bright it made a shadow of my lamp on my wall and it was keeping me up because it was right in my eyes. i kept watching it and it was right over the canopy of my pines which are about 35 feet tall. all of a sudden it shifted and moved over. i seriously got chills and just sort of went numb. i waited about 2 minutes and kept an eye on it and then it went up i quickly woke my wife and she thought i was crazy but did admit it was the brightest star she had ever seen her and i sat up for about 5 minutes on the side of the bed watching it and then it did it again it went down and then shifted right. she lost it she was very scared and didnt understand what was going on. and then we watched it sort of fade out back to almost a normal sized star we watched for about 10 minutes and it didnt move and then the light got brighter than it was when i first observed it and it moved downward and then sort of uneasily hovered around. and then this is when i got scared there was a very smallred light that appeared of to the right of the star it wasnt bright but it was visible and then the red dot just dropped and i lost sight of it because it went behind the canopy shadow of my pines. then the bright star just seemed to fade out... this was a very strange night for us and i didnt feel that it was a normal event thats why i had to share to see if anyone else experienced anything like this near north ga...
content.summary: Odd star like sighting

content.detailedDescription:
I will start by saying these are pictures from my friends phone, that is why i've answered the questions unknown. we have our opinions on the photo's and would really like a professional's opinion.

we were going through his pictures on this laptop when he came to these photos and clicked through them quickly as they were not really what we were interested in looking at, as he did this i noticed this weird green thing in each picture and told him to go back. we went through them and were astonished at what we had just seen. i began to ask him questions as i was amazed at what i had seen. he told me he was taking pictures of a weird massive lightning storm which was taking place at the time and that he didn't see or even know the green object was there. these pictures were taken over about a 20 minute period, some being only seconds after each other.

in picture 323 you can zoom into the object which looks like it has windows? and there is also a blue spotlight looking thing that follows the object.A few people i've shown say its reflections from the light pole which it could be and the pictures are not that great zoomed in but in picture 323 that to me just looks like a ufo. 

i know these picture's are not fake because my mate that took the pictures has no chance at making something like this on the pc and he was more amazed then me as this was the 1st time anyone had ever pointed it out.
content.summary: Green glowing ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking the dogs outside my house at 8:02pm when i saw a bright red light glowing in the s-se direction from my home.  i pointed it out to my 20 yr old son. it seemed to be glowing cherry red and then slowing changed to a bright orange color.  we took the dogs back inside and we both came out with my nikon binoculars (10x50).  
when we came back outside, we had momentary lost the object, but after a few second, noticed that it had went below the tree-line and is now raising back to the initial altitude above the tree/house line.
i noticed that a fast corporate jet had just flown over my house (probably taken off from st.Pete airport and there was another commerical jet south bound at a higher altitude.
i was able to focus in on both of those jets and see the individual lights onboard clearly.  but, when i focused on the bright red object, it just showed up as a bright sphere.  it was so bright that it seemed to have a 'aura or halo" around it.  it seemed to slowly change from a bright red to a bright orange and then a bright yellow in color.
we both watched it change from a westerly upward direction to a southern directtion, it seemed to be a dull yellowish color as it flew southward and out of site within 15-20 seconds.
content.summary: Red glowing object in night sky

content.detailedDescription: Last night 28 september 2013 between 19h00 and 19h20 i saw a strange light south east from me at about 40 degrees above the horizon. the light appeared to be about three lights bunched together of which one was extremely bright, altogether much larger than any star. at first i thought that it was an aircraft turning from a northerly to a westerly direction with its landing light on. the bethlehem airport is located to the south of us. i soon realised that it was not turning but slowly moving northwards but also dropping at the same time. at around this time i also noticed the flashing light of an aircraft mush higher in the sky about 85 degrees above the horizon more to the south. i failed to notice in which direction the aircraft was moving (south to durban or north to johannesburg). the bright light then suddenly developed a cloud around it, at first small but gradually grew in size. the cloud was a perfect circle but appeared out of focus, the centre of which contained the light, now not so large but still focused and fairly bright. i went into the house fetched my reading glasses and my wife. we watched a while before i fetched my cell phone and took some photo's in which the round cloud is visible but nothing defined can be seen. the cloud around the light appeared to flatten out at the bottom when it reached about 10 degrees above the horizon, at this point east from us. the cloud and light disappeared as it became obstructed by the tree top and houses.
content.summary: Bright light moving from south to north dropping in altitude, developed purfect cloud circle around it which grew in size.
